item.title: Flask-Create Web Service with SQLAlchemy + PostgreSQL
item.description: # Flask-Create a web service with SQLAlchemy + PostgreSQL Introduction We will introduce using a sample application (Feedback). This article is for Mac environment, but the procedure is the same for Windows environment. Please read the environment-dependent part and try again. Purpose After reading this article, you’ll be able to: | No. | Overview | Keywords | | :— | :——————— | :——————– —– | | 1 | Flask-SQLAlchemy Development | Flask-SQLAlchemy, psycopg2 | | 2 | PostgreSQL settings | psql, Flask-Migrate |
